mapper.select: select id, content, creator, url, status, parent, createTime from comment c where postid=#{postid} and (status='approve' or creator=#{creator} ) order by c.createTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment(id,postid, parent, email, url, ip, agent,content, creator, createTime) values(#{id},#{postid},#{parent},#{email},#{url},#{ip},#{agent},#{content},#{creator},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update comment set status=#{status} where id=#{commentid}
